entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
